cause.description:
Phi Gamma Delta - Not for College Days Alone
Mission - The Phi Gamma Delta Educational Foundation's mission is to promote academic excellence among our undergraduate brothers by sponsoring academic scholarships, alcohol education, leadership training and character development. To accomplish this mission, the Foundation relies upon the generous finanical support of Phi Gamma Delta graduate brothers.
Vision - The Phi Gamma Delta Educational Foundation is saving lives through alcohol education, changing lives with academic scholarships, and shaping lives through leadership training. As a result, the Educational Foundation is ensuring the success of our undergraduate brothers-building tomorrow's leaders, one brother at a time!
1. Shaping lives through leadership training
2. Changing lives with academic scholarships
3. Saving lives through alcohol education
cause.mission: To promote academic excellence among our undergraduate brothers.
cause.name: Phi Gamma Delta Educational Foundation
